nodes.text: The Cobral Hideout was a fortified bunker located a short distance south of the city Restuss on Naboo's swamp moon of Rori during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

By the time of the Battle of Yavin, the base was the headquarters of the Neo-Cobral space pirates, a gang of smugglers and black market dealers who once controlled the planet Frego. The Neo-Cobrals had forged Imperial documents to get a hold of this fortress.
Circa 1 ABY, a commoner in Narmle intended to recruit adventurers to assault the Cobral Hideout and eliminate the Neo-Cobral Overlord who was seeking the domination of the moon.

The same year, Jabba the Hutt dispatched an assassin to eliminate the scientist leading the Kahmurra Biogenetic Research Station on Talus but the assassin failed in his mission and was captured. Jabba's lieutenant Yondalla later recruited a spacer to recover a CorSec prisoner transfer document in the Kahmurra Biogenetic Research Station.
The Cobral Hideout was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
